mapper.select: SELECT status FROM chat_request WHERE inviter_account = #{sendingAccount} AND receiver_account = #{receiverAccount}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_request (chat_id, inviter_account, receiver_account, status, invite_time) VALUES (#{chatId}, #{inviterAccount}, #{receiverAccount}, #{status}, #{inviteTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE chat_request SET status = #{status} WHERE inviter_account = #{inviterAccount} and receiver_account = #{receiverAccount}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_history (chat_history_id, sending_account, receiver_account, time_stamp, content) VALUES (#{chatHistoryId}, #{sendingAccount}, #{receiverAccount}, #{timeStamp}, #{content})
